English: Field heliport
Gravette
Well done, comrade Kukushkin, well done. You exceeded my expectations and proved yet again you are more than capable of carrying out difficult tasks. I am impressed.
It brings me immense joy to bring victory to our soldiers, comrade Zubarev.
I know your loyalty is in the right place. As I told you before, there is a group comprising of high military officers, powerful politicians and influential oligarchs.

We work together towards a common goal of serving the Soviet Union to the best of our abilities. As not everyone would understand our grand ideas and goals, we work in secret and only accept the very best and the most loyal to our cause.
I believe I qualify on both accounts!
You do. Tell me, what is your opinion of late comrade Livanokh?
He was before my time, I only heard about him. He was a great general, daring to challenge the western enemy - only to be betrayed by Kremlin. Are you continuing in his legacy?

I can tell you if you join. So, let me ask you - will you become part of our group? Will you fight for the better future of this country against all its enemies within and without? Will you put its people above your personal ambition? Will you unconditionally obey comrade Volkov and other senior figures in the group?
Will you keep the group's secret and never tell it? Joining is for a lifetime and there is no going back. Are you ready to devote your body and soul to our righteous cause?
Comrade Zubarev, I... I am ready! More than that, I want it, more than anything else in the world!
Allow me then, comrade Kukushkin, to welcome you... to the Red Hand!
This is it, comrades! The final assault and as before, we are to support it from the air!
It is up to us that the attack succeeds! Expect anti-air guns, gunships and shitload of tanks! There is no doubt in my mind that we shall prevail and finish this war here and now!
Into the air, comrades!
Soviet Forces
Air Support
SUPPORT THE ATTACK ON SAINT PIERRE
RETURN TO HELIPORT
